frameset.edef: be in harmony with, be in accord, agreement with

example.parse: (SQ (PRT (INTERROG_PART هل)) (NP-TPC-1 (NP (DEM_PRON_MS هذا)) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM التوجه))) (VP (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I يأتلف) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (NP-ADV (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC مع) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN القيم)) (SBAR (SBAR (WHNP-2 (REL_PRON التي)) (S (VP (IV3FS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I تنادي) (PP-CLR (PREP ب) (NP (NP (PRON_3FS ها)) (NP (-NONE- *T*-2)))) (NP-SBJ (NOUN_PROP اميركا))))) (PUNC ,) (CONJ و) (SBAR (WHNP-3 (-NONE- 0)) (S (NP-SBJ (NP (PRON_3FS هي)) (NP (-NONE- *T*-3))) (NP-PRD (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_NOM الحرية)) (CONJ و) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_NOM الديموقراطية)) (CONJ و) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM حقوق) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الانسان))))))))) (PUNC ?)))

arg.g: with the values called by the United States

example.arg: مع القيم التي تنادي بها اميركا

frameset.edef: to unite, to merge, to form a coalition
